amendment.description: Amendment sought to zero out the funding for Payments to Air Carriers and apply the savings of $155 million to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to zero out the funding for Payments to Air Carriers and apply the savings of $155 million to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 166 - 255 (Roll no. 298).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
